StoryTextNotTimeToLeaveEryn.text: There's something I still have to do.

StoryTextFirstTimeLeaving.text: Leaving the mall will advance the story.|Unfinished optional events will be lost.

StoryTextCantEnterBasementShower.text: This leads to the showers. No thanks.

StoryTextDay00CantExit.text: It's not time for your break yet.

StoryTextDay00NPC0Customers.text: We really need to make some sales.|Please help each customer.

StoryTextDay00NPC1Choice.text: Do you think this will fit my husband?|{ Uh..                { Yes, of course

StoryTextDay00NPC1Choice1Line0.text: These are one size fits all.

StoryTextDay00NPC1Choice1Line1.text: These say 38x34 that's not his size|You're trying to trick me.

StoryTextDay00NPC2Choice.text: Are these all the shirts you have?|{ Yes                 { Define 'all'

StoryTextDay00NPC2Choice0Line1.text: We don't even have a back.

StoryTextDay00NPC2Choice0Line2.text: Oh, OK. Well these aren't what I'm looking for.

StoryTextDay00NPC2Choice1Line0.text: I mean, like are there others somewhere else?

StoryTextDay00NPC2Choice1Line1.text: Like not on these racks right here?

StoryTextDay00LisaWorriedLine0.text: Neither of them wanted anything?|It's not your fault, sales are terrible lately.|You might as well leave early since it's dead here.

StoryTextDay00LisaWorriedLine1.text: My ride isn't coming for an hour.

StoryTextDay00LisaWorriedLine2.text: You don't want to be here after closing.| There's some weirdo wandering around late.|I asked Todd to walk me to my car every night.|Why don't you stop by the info desk if you have extra time.|It's a good place to learn about the mall.

StoryTextDay00InfoDeskLine3.text: As a welcome gift you can take something|from the lost & found bin.

StoryTextDay00InfoDeskLine4.text: Why would I want to do that?

StoryTextDay00InfoDeskLine5.text: At least take something you can trade.

StoryTextDay00InfoDeskLine7.text: Mall employees trade all kinds of items.|Maybe you can get something better.

StoryTextDay00InfoDeskLine10.text: (What am I going to do with this scarf?)

StoryTextDay00CavernChoice.text: Do you want to try a new game? I'll put it on free play.|{ Sure, why not       { Maybe later

StoryTextDay00CavernChoice0.text: Alright, it's this one over here.

StoryTextDay00CavernChoice1.text: Alright, stop by when you're free.

StoryTextDay00CavernLine3.text: Yeah, it's the future I guess.

StoryTextDay00CavernLine4.text: I don't think this is for me.

StoryTextDay00CavernLine5.text: Which games do you like to play?

StoryTextDay00CavernLine6.text: We just have an old Atari at home.|Pac Man is fun even if it looks bad.

StoryTextDay00CavernLine7.text: I get that.|Thanks for trying this anyway.|Stop by anytime.

StoryTextDay00SVideoChoice.text: I don't suppose you want to help the new girl?|{ Help with what?     { Maybe later

StoryTextDay00SVideoChoice0.text: It's my first day and my manager ditched me with all these boxes.

StoryTextDay00SVideoChoice1.text: I'd really appreciate it if you can.

StoryTextDay00SVideoLine1.text: It's also my first day.|But my manager sent me home early.

StoryTextDay00SVideoLine2.text: Jealous. Mine just disappeared.|I probably have to figure out how to close on my own.

StoryTextDay00SVideoLine4.text: I'm sure. It's just a lot deal with on my first day.|Also I'm new in town and don't know anyone yet.|Alright, where does this one go...

StoryTextDay00SVideoLine6.text: Thanks, I can get the rest from here.

StoryTextNight00TBooksLine1.text: So Carl, how's this temp assignment going?

StoryTextNight00TBooksLine2.text: It's been great.|I've even made a bunch of new friends.

StoryTextNight00TBooksLine3.text: I see you already earned a key to every store|by helping them with various chores.

StoryTextNight00TBooksLine4.text: Yeah, it's nice to get that out of the way.

StoryTextNight00TBooksLine5.text: Don't get too comfortable.|The permanent manager starts 12/31.

StoryTextNight00TBooksLine6.text: Yeah, it's nice to get that out of the way.|I still have one errand.|I need to deliver a special order for a new person.

StoryTextNight00TBooksLine7.text: I'll leave you to it then.

StoryTextNight00EEHallLine1.text: Hey! I told you not to loiter after closing!

StoryTextNight00EEHallLine4.text: I see that guy every night, usually trying to hide.|He doesn't work here. He's up to something.

StoryTextNight00SVideoLine2.text: Yes, are you from the bookstore?

StoryTextNight00SVideoLine3.text: That's right, I have the book you ordered.

StoryTextNight00SVideoLine4.text: Thanks! I'm new in town and it's kinda boring. I hope I find something fun to do.|It's not much, but have a free VHS tape. Sorry if it's not your thing.

StoryTextNight00SouthHallLine3.text: You're losing it Carl.|Putting in too many late nights isn't good for you.

StoryTextNight00SouthHallLine4.text: (Who was that anyway?)|(I don't remember him being a customer)

StoryTextNight00VBChoice.text: Heading out already?|{ Stay and talk       { Maybe later

StoryTextNight00VBChoice0.text: You always are done with closing before me.

StoryTextNight00VBLine1.text: It's not a race, just how it goes.

StoryTextNight00VBLine2.text: You'd think after 2 years I'd be faster.

StoryTextNight00VBLine4.text: 2 years next month actually.|I was a salesman for Tandy before then.|We were getting beat by IBM & my region closed.|Luckily this store was opening then.

StoryTextNight00VBLine5.text: Have you always worked in tech sales?

StoryTextNight00VBLine6.text: I sold cars for a while, clothes for a while.|I'm happy to sell anything to anyone.

StoryTextNight00VBLine7.text: I've only worked in the bookstore.|I'm a bookworm though.

StoryTextNight00VBLine8.text: Sounds like a good fit.|Maybe you'll write one someday.|I think it's time to finish closing up here.|Have a good night.

StoryTextNight00CPlanetChoice.text: Hey Carl, stopping by to chat?|{ That's right        { Jusy saying 'bye'

StoryTextNight00CPlanetChoice0.text: Great, maybe I can finally figure out what kind of music you like.

StoryTextNight00CPlanetLine1.text: I told you, I mostly read.

StoryTextNight00CPlanetLine2.text: There has to be something you like.

StoryTextNight00CPlanetLine3.text: I told you, I mostly read.

StoryTextNight00CPlanetLine5.text: This is 'Metaphysical Graffiti'.|It came out earlier this year.|What do you think?

StoryTextNight00CPlanetLine6.text: It's kind of weird.|I don't think it's for me.

StoryTextNight00CPlanetLine9.text: Sorry, this isn't for me either.

StoryTextNight00CPlanetLine10.text: I'm not going to quit trying.

StoryTextDay01DenimCountryLine1.text: I have an assignment for you.

StoryTextDay01DenimCountryLine3.text: Please ask other stores if they've seen anything weird lately.

StoryTextDay01DenimCountryLine4.text: I thought it would be something work related.

StoryTextDay01DenimCountryLine5.text: This is important.|I can't explain right now.|Just ask around please.

StoryTextDay01CPlanetLine1.text: You want to know if anything weird happened here?

StoryTextDay01CPlanetLine3.text: Nothing more than the usual weirdos.|Well.|There's one raggedy guy who stops by a lot.|He never buys anything.|I don't know his deal.

StoryTextDay01WWAppliancesLine1.text: Anything weird?|When I opened this morning it looked like someone tried to use one of the washers.|They made a huge mess.

StoryTextDay01WWAppliancesLine2.text: Maybe it was the night crew?

StoryTextDay01WWAppliancesLine3.text: I was stuck working a double shift.|It had to be after closing.

StoryTextDay01DenimCountry2Line3.text: Are you going to tell me why you sent me out on this?

StoryTextDay01DenimCountry2Line4.text: OK, but don't think I'm crazy.|Look at this letter I received.|It was slipped through the gate.

StoryTextDay01DenimCountry2Line5.text: 'Lisa, you should know that your store will close in January.|There's nothing you can do to prevent it.|I'm warning you because you seem like a good person.|You should get out before it happens.|-A friend.'

StoryTextDay01DenimCountry2Line6.text: It's really creeping me out.|Who sent this?|What if they're right?

StoryTextDay01CavernChoice.text: This kid again...|{ Do you need help?   { Not my problem

StoryTextDay01CavernChoice0.text: Yeah, that would be great.|I have to fix something in the back.|Can you keep an eye on things for a bit?

StoryTextDay01CavernLine4.text: Just a temp. Do you need change or something?

StoryTextDay01CavernLine7.text: I just watch other people play.

StoryTextDay01CavernLine8.text: You watch other people play games?

StoryTextDay01CavernLine9.text: It's still fun. Maybe it will be on TV some day.

StoryTextDay01CavernLine10.text: Isn't it time for you to loiter across the hall?

StoryTextDay01CavernLine12.text: Poor kid is stuck here all day.|Like the mall is a free babysitter.|Thanks for helping out.

StoryTextDay01FCBCampingChoice.text: Have a minute to catch-up?|{ OK                  { Maybe later

StoryTextDay01FCBCampingChoice0.text: I don't know if you remember me.|I was friends with your parents in the 70s.

StoryTextDay01FCBCampingLine1.text: Vaguely. You were over a couple times when I was young.

StoryTextDay01FCBCampingLine2.text: That's right. We drifted apart as the kids got older.|We were friends in high school.|Your parents were a couple even back then.

StoryTextDay01FCBCampingLine3.text: That's what they told me too.

StoryTextDay01FCBCampingLine4.text: Our little group did everything together.|Although there wasn't much to do then.|Mostly hanging out, camping in the summer.|We had took a couple roadtrips too.|The usual teenage stuff.

StoryTextDay01FCBCampingLine5.text: They told me about a couple of them.

StoryTextDay01FCBCampingLine6.text: I won't bore you with them now.|Stop by if you ever want to hear about them.

StoryTextNight01WEHallLine1.text: Hey, didn't I see you last week?|Don't worry, I won't call security.|Are you in some kind of trouble?

StoryTextNight01CavernLine1.text: Did some guy come through here?

StoryTextNight01CavernLine3.text: You sure? I swear he went this way.

StoryTextNight01CavernLine4.text: Even if he did, it's not my business.|Snooping around too much can cause drama.|I'm not getting involved again.

StoryTextNight01EEHallLine2.text: No, I'm just...|Sorry, where do I know you from?

StoryTextNight01TLodgeLine1.text: Can you believe this place lasted so long?| Look at the junk they're trying to sell.|They should have closed 12 years ago.

StoryTextNight01SouthHallLine2.text: I already have a ride.|Aren't I a little young for you?

StoryTextNight01SouthHallLine3.text: What? No it's not...|(geez)|I'm just saying hi.|I don't even have a car.|I'm on a temp assignment.|I'm staying at the discount hotel across the street.

StoryTextNight01SouthHallLine4.text: What? No it's not...|(geez)|I'm just saying hi.|I don't even have a car.|I'm on a temp assignment.|I'm staying at the discount hotel across the street.

StoryTextNight01SouthHallLine5.text: Telling me about your hotel room..|Real subtle.

StoryTextNight01SouthHallLine6.text: No! Why do you keep going there?|Since I'm basically living here I like to meet the other employees.|That's it, I swear.

StoryTextNight01SouthHallLine7.text: OK then, I'm Eryn. I work at Denim Country.|I don't work that much though.|Lisa sends me on crazy snipe hunts.

StoryTextNight01SouthHallLine8.text: She did the same thing over summer.|Drove last help to quit.

StoryTextNight01SouthHallLine9.text: I'm only here until January so whatever.

StoryTextNight01SouthHallLine10.text: You never know.|That's what I thought 8 years ago.

StoryTextNight01SouthHallLine11.text: You can help her after I'm gone then.|There's my ride.

StoryTextNight01WWAppliancesChoice.text: Know how to fix a refrigerator?|{ I can try           { I don't think so

StoryTextNight01WWAppliancesChoice0.text: Great, this one is acting funny.

StoryTextNight01WWAppliancesChoice1.text: I'd appreciate it if you could try.

StoryTextNight01WWAppliancesLine1.text: Are they supposed to be on?

StoryTextNight01WWAppliancesLine2.text: They aren't supposed to be cool.|But the light should come on.|This one isn't.|I already tried the bulb in a different one.

StoryTextNight01WWAppliancesLine3.text: Don't ask how I know,|but I bet it's the door switch.|(...)|Yeah, it's jammed. Let me try...|...and I think it's good for now.

StoryTextNight01WWAppliancesLine4.text: Good enough for me.|Thanks for the help.

StoryTextNight01VBChoice.text: Thanksgiving weekend...|{ Stay and talk       { Maybe later

StoryTextNight01VBChoice0.text: Hey Carl. I was just thinking for a minute.

StoryTextNight01VBChoice1.text: Sorry, lost in thought.|Stop by if you get a chance.

StoryTextNight01VBLine2.text: More like lack thereof.|My family didn't really celebrate.|Neither set of grandparents were happy about my parents' marriage.|We usually got Chinese food to go.

StoryTextNight01VBLine4.text: I guess it wasn't.|I never mind working this weekend though.|Let people with big gatherings take off.

StoryTextNight01VBLine5.text: I feel the same.|My family is small & scattered.|Working this weekend feels like a chaotic dinner anyway.

StoryTextNight01VBLine6.text: Never thought about it that way.|This must be the quiet after-dinner part.

StoryTextNight01VBLine7.text: I guess so.|I'll let you get back to closing.

StoryTextDay02VBLine1.text: Why are you asking me about this?

StoryTextDay02VBLine2.text: I don't know.|She told me to talk to people who worked here a long time.

StoryTextDay02VBLine3.text: Well I'm old, but this store isn't.|We only opened 2 years ago.|The mall opened in 1975.|I believe ThoreauBooks & Transistor Lodge are the only original stores left.|Maybe they know some mall legends.

StoryTextDay02VBLine5.text: Like urban legends, but in a mall.|All of them have some weird bits of history.

StoryTextDay02TLodgeLine1.text: Mall legends?|There's one I think is true.

StoryTextDay02TLodgeLine3.text: When the mall was built in 1975, it had a state of the art computer system. For climate control and muzac.|Seemed like overkill for the time.|At least once a month the mall manager comes here looking for an old part.|So there's some old computer he's maintaining.

StoryTextDay02TBooksLine1.text: Oh, hey. I'm sorry about the other night.|I came across creepy.

StoryTextDay02TBooksLine2.text: It's OK. Let's move on.|Do you know any mall legends?|Maybe going back to 1975.

StoryTextDay02TBooksLine3.text: Well I am older than the average mall employee...|I've only been here 6 months though.|I'm the assistant manager at a different location.|I'm filling in until they hire a permanent manager.|This mall is too weird for me.|The customers I mean.

StoryTextDay02TBooksLine4.text: They aren't very smart.|Not sure about weird.

StoryTextDay02TBooksLine5.text: Maybe it's only here.|I get a lot of customers that are dressed odd.|Or that ask for books I never heard of.|Maybe they're tourists.

StoryTextDay02DenimCountryNotDone.text: Sounds like you didn't find much yet.

StoryTextDay02DenimCountryLine1.text: So that's all you found?|Old computers & weirdos?

StoryTextDay02DenimCountryLine2.text: Not sure what else you were expecting.

StoryTextDay02DenimCountryLine3.text: I'm sorry. I thought you might get lucky.|The letter is from someone who knows the mall well.|How else would they know a store will close?

StoryTextDay02DenimCountryLine5.text: That sounds awful.|Who would do that?|Oh, by the way...|Jen from Nut Shack came by looking for you.|I didn't know you were friends.

StoryTextDay02DenimCountryLine6.text: Neither did I.|(I should see what she wants)

StoryTextDay02NShackLine1.text: I think it's same as last year.

StoryTextDay02NShackLine2.text: Maybe. I tried talking to him but he wouldn't open up.

StoryTextDay02NShackLine3.text: I don't want to get involved.|If he talks to me that's fine.|But I'm looking for drama again.

StoryTextDay02NShackLine6.text: It's fine, you're not interupting.|Employees stop here for snacks often,|so I hear a lot of rumors.|You're asking around about something right?

StoryTextDay02NShackLine7.text: I'm not. Lisa wants to know who sent this letter.|I don't care.|I think it's a prank.

StoryTextDay02NShackLine8.text: Maybe. Who could really know the future anyway?|Still, it could be someone who cares about her.|Denim on denim won't be fashionable forvever.|Have I seen you waiting in the hallway at night?

StoryTextDay02NShackLine9.text: Yeah, I don't have a car yet.

StoryTextDay02NShackLine10.text: You can wait here instead.|There are some real odd types hanging around after close lately.

StoryTextNight02TBooksLine1.text: (I'm done early tonight)|(I should check-in with some friends)|(Who haven't I seen in a while?)

StoryTextDay02SVideoChoice.text: Can you watch the store for a minute?|{ How hard can it be? { Maybe later

StoryTextDay02SVideoChoice0.text: Thanks, I'm just grabbing a snack.

StoryTextDay02SVideoChoice1.text: If you can help that would be great.

StoryTextDay02SVideoLine1.text: Hey. Is this the video store?

StoryTextDay02SVideoLine4.text: Did this store used to be something else?

StoryTextDay02SVideoLine5.text: Everything used to be something else.

StoryTextDay02SVideoLine7.text: Do you have a military discount?

StoryTextDay02SVideoLine12.text: That's a relief.|I thought you'd get the usual dumb customers.|Thanks again.

StoryTextDay02FCBCampingChoice.text: Got time for a quick memory?|{ OK                  { Maybe later

StoryTextDay02FCBCampingChoice0.text: The summer after graduation, our group drove up north to go camping.|Your mom was so excited.|She packed a ton of food & grilling supplies.|It rained all weekend though.|We ended up eating at a dumpy small town pizza place.|Luckily she also packed extra blankets,|it was so cold at night.

StoryTextDay02FCBCampingLine2.text: It was a good time though.|When you're with good friends even a bad situation turns out alright.

StoryTextNight02FCBCampingLine1.text: What brings you by so late?

StoryTextNight02FCBCampingLine2.text: Nothing really.|Just seeing how things are going.

StoryTextNight02FCBCampingLine3.text: That's good.|I thought you might be sneaking into a tent for the night.

StoryTextNight02FCBCampingLine5.text: Not recently but last year.|An ex employee was living here at night.|He got away with it for over a month.|I wait here until it's time to lock up.|In case someone else gets that idea.

StoryTextNight02FCBCampingLine6.text: Someone living in the mall...|Trying to find a place to sleep every night.|It's sad to think about.|(I wonder if it's happening again.)

StoryTextNight02NShackLine1.text: Is this one of the after hours people you warned me about?

StoryTextNight02NShackLine2.text: Yeah, watch out for this guy.

StoryTextNight02NShackLine4.text: You know I'm kidding.|Carl here is harmless.|He even helped me deal with some expired products.

StoryTextNight02NShackLine5.text: I don't know if my back will ever recover.|Are you on break?

StoryTextNight02NShackLine6.text: I'm loitering until my ride comes.

StoryTextNight02NShackLine7.text: This is a popular spot for that.|I'll probably see you here again then.

StoryTextNight02WWHallLine1.text: Finally taking off for the night?

StoryTextNight02WWHallLine2.text: Yeah. And why are you here after close?

StoryTextNight02WWHallLine3.text: Same reason as you.|Where else do I have to be?

StoryTextNight02CNowLine1.text: Just look at this place.|Remember when it was...|What was it called again?

StoryTextNight02CNowLine3.text: C'mon, it's not like I'm here to rob the place.

StoryTextNight02VBChoice.text: Stopping by to talk?|{ That's right        { Maybe later

StoryTextNight02VBChoice0.text: I'm waiting for the register to finish doing its thing.

StoryTextNight02VBLine2.text: Always. The computer it runs on is ancient.|And that's coming from me.|I haven't sold Tandy's for 2 years|but even those were newer.|This is a modified C128.|The real problem is the modem.|300 baud, it takes forever.

StoryTextNight02VBLine3.text: I don't know what any of that means.|I'll take your word for it.

StoryTextNight02VBLine4.text: I know it sounds complicated.|Thanks for listening.

StoryTextNight02CPlanetChoice.text: I think I figured it out...|{ Figured what out?   { Maybe later

StoryTextNight02CPlanetChoice0.text: How to find out what kind of music you like.

StoryTextNight02CPlanetLine2.text: That's right. I have a quiz this time.|Question #1: what is your favorite color?

StoryTextNight02CPlanetLine4.text: Seriously?|OK, next..|If you were a dog, what breed would you be?

StoryTextNight02CPlanetLine6.text: At a party do want to be the center of attention?

StoryTextNight02CPlanetLine7.text: I don't remember going to one.

StoryTextNight02CPlanetLine8.text: Would you rather live in the city or country?

StoryTextNight02CPlanetLine10.text: Alright, this says 'City Pop'.|That can't be right.

StoryTextNight02CPlanetLine11.text: I've never heard of it.|Thanks for trying I guess.

StoryTextDay03DenimCountryLine1.text: Alright, no one would fess up to sending me that letter.

StoryTextDay03DenimCountryLine2.text: I didn't go to the so-called food court.|I can't even set foot in PogoDawg.|It's too gross in there.|Can you go for me?

StoryTextDay03DenimCountryInprogress.text: Let me know what the guy at PogoDawg says.|(If he says anything coherent)

StoryTextDay03DenimCountry2Line2.text: I assume he wasn't any help then.|Sorry if I wasted your time.|I don't know what to make of this.|Either someone is lying to me,|or that letter came from someone I didn't talk to.

StoryTextDay03PogoDawgLine1.text: Hi. Did you send this letter?

StoryTextDay03PogoDawgLine2.text: Huh?|Woah.|Uh, can I take your, um, order?

StoryTextDay03PogoDawgLine4.text: Uh. For here or, ah, what is it called?|For delivery?

StoryTextDay03PogoDawgLine6.text: Are you the... |where was I?|Right, the new delivery girl?

StoryTextDay03PogoDawgLine8.text: OK. There are 1, no, wait, um..|No, 2 orders. Is that.. yeah 2.

StoryTextDay03PogoDawgLine9.text: These bags here?|There aren't names on them.|Just these crude pictures.|4 squares on one, a dress (maybe) on the other.

StoryTextDay03PogoDawgLine10.text: Yeah, that's, uh...|...|Where they, you know, go.

StoryTextDay03PogoDawgLine11.text: If I deliver these will you answer my question?

StoryTextDay03PogoDawgInprogress.text: Uh, we'll talk when you are, what, yeah, done.

StoryTextDay03CheckersLine1.text: I think this is for you.

StoryTextDay03CheckersLine2.text: I thought you worked with Lisa?

StoryTextDay03CheckersLine3.text: This is a vital part of the job.

StoryTextDay03CheckersLine4.text: I don't get it, but OK.|Hey, did she mention my new years party?|She hasn't said if she's coming.

StoryTextDay03CNowLine1.text: It is, thanks. I'm stuck here alone today.|Care to join me for lunch?

StoryTextDay03SouthHallLine1.text: Hey. I don't suppose you have an extra order?

StoryTextDay03PogoDawg2Line1.text: I determined you didn't write this letter|because I don't think you can read or write.

StoryTextDay03PogoDawg2Line2.text: That's, uh, mean. No, I mean, um, right.

StoryTextDay03CavernChoice.text: Want to test something?|{ Sure                { Maybe later

StoryTextDay03CavernChoice0.text: All these games have difficulty settings.|You have to find the right balance.|See if this one is too hard.

StoryTextDay03CavernLine1.text: Kind of, maybe if I practiced.

StoryTextDay03CavernLine2.text: You shouldn't have to though.|I'll turn it back down.

StoryTextDay03CavernLine5.text: That's bad too.|One person could play it forever.|That's fine for a home game.|I have to break even here.|Anyway, that's all for today.|Thanks for helping.

StoryTextDay03SVideoChoice.text: Are you good at math?|{ I'm OK              { Never heard of it

StoryTextDay03SVideoChoice0.text: I have a final tomorrow.|I'm stuck on this graph.|How can I prove whether this graph is a tree?

StoryTextDay03SVideoLine1.text: You could disprove it quickly by proving the graph contains a circuit.

StoryTextDay03SVideoLine4.text: Thanks, I think I can get the rest of these now.

StoryTextNight03TBooksLine1.text: (Maybe I am losing it)|(I keep seeing that guy in a suit)|(He knows me but I don't know him)|(Is he even real?)|(I should revist where he went)

StoryTextNight03TLodgeLine1.text: Has a guy in a suit been by here?|After closing I mean.

StoryTextNight03TLodgeLine2.text: I forgot to lock up & someone like that came in.|It was a while ago.

StoryTextNight03TLodgeLine4.text: He made fun of our store and left.|Said he didn't know how we were still open.|What a jerk.

StoryTextNight03TLodgeAltLine1.text: Last month some guy in a suit was here.|It was after closing. Do you remember?

StoryTextNight03TLodgeAltLine2.text: I remember. I forgot to lock the gate.|He was all rude about my store.

StoryTextNight03TLodgeAltLine4.text: I remember he talked to you.|I thought you were friends.

StoryTextNight03TLodgeAltLine5.text: Defininely not friends.|I can't get over something he said.|That he was surprised you were still open.

StoryTextNight03TLodgeAltLine6.text: I know, business is great this year.|I don't know what he meant by that.|Maybe he's just a jerk.

StoryTextNight03CNowLine1.text: Did a guy in a suit come here after close?|About two weeks ago.

StoryTextNight03CNowLine2.text: Yeah, he just barged right in.|I thought he was a robber.|I was so scared.|He just made fun of the store & left.

StoryTextNight03CNowLine3.text: He didn't say why he was there?

StoryTextNight03CNowLine4.text: No, he just made rude comments and left.|Who does that?

StoryTextNight03CNowAltLine1.text: About two weeks ago, do you remember? The guy in the suit who was here after close?

StoryTextNight03CNowAltLine2.text: I can't forget it.|I didn't thank you for showing up when you did.|I thought he was there to rob us.|You must have scared him away.

StoryTextNight03CNowAltLine3.text: I don't think so.|He talked like he knew me.

StoryTextNight03CNowAltLine4.text: I thought he was a customer of yours.|You really never saw him before?

StoryTextNight03CNowAltLine5.text: No. I mean, kind of.|I've seen him before.|But I don't know him.

StoryTextNight03CantEnterNShack.text: I have something to finish first.

StoryTextNight03NShackLine1.text: You're late. Just like Eryn's ride.

StoryTextNight03NShackLine2.text: I'm sorry. I was looking into something.|Has a rude guy in a suit been to your stores?

StoryTextNight03NShackLine3.text: I've had rude guys,|and guys in suits.|Not both at the same time.

StoryTextNight03NShackLine4.text: Guys in suits aren't our demographic.

StoryTextNight03NShackLine5.text: Why do you care about this rude guy in a suit?

StoryTextNight03NShackLine6.text: I keep running into him.|And he knows my name,|acts like we're acquanted.

StoryTextNight03NShackLine7.text: He's probably just a customer.|You talk to a dozen people a day.|You can't remember all their names.

StoryTextNight03NShackLine8.text: That's probably it. Thanks.|I'm working open to close every day.|Maybe I'm exhausted.

StoryTextNight03NShackLine9.text: Yeah, go to that hotel room you told me about.

StoryTextNight03NShackLine10.text: You are never going to let me forget that are you...

StoryTextNight03WWAppliancesChoice.text: Do this event or whatever?|{ Sure                { Maybe later
